question:
Many people think that antibiotics are a cure-all, but these medications can actually ________ the problem; taken inconsistently, antibiotics can in fact strengthen bacterial strains.
Two Answers
A. exacerbate
B. ameliorate
C. differentiate
D. distort
E. pathologize
F. magnify
